ply.banned_self: You are banned from this server
ply.group_changed: Your group has been changed to <green>%s</green>.
ply.error_get: Could find player. Please try again.

warning.toggled_self: The status of one of your warnings has been changed. Check your warnings with !dashboard.

warning.received: You have received a warning by <green>%s</green>: <red>%s</red>

ban.status_changed: Successfully set ban status of %s to %s.
ban.user_banned: <red>%s</red> has been banned by <green>%s</green> for <red>%s</red>. Reason: <green>%s</green>

rslots.kick: A player with a reserved slot connected to the server and you got kicked to free up space
rslots.full_no_slot: The server is full and you do not have access to a reserved slot

other.error_api: Error while communicating with the API: %s
